item.title: Trudy add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "Will there be heinous fuckery, Pocket?" -- Christopher Moore

item.title: Trudy add a quote by Christopher Moore
item.description: "WARNING This is a bawdy tale. Herein you will find gratuitous shagging, murder, spanking, maiming, treason, and heretofore unexplored heights of vulgarity and profanity, as well as non-traditional grammar, split infinitives, and the odd wank. If that sort of thing bothers you, then gentle reader pass by, for we endeavor only to entertain, not to offend. That said, if thatâ€™s the sort of thing you think you might enjoy, then you have happened upon the perfect story!" -- Christopher Moore
